short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps detecting single page applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1) Clicking to extension icon prompts alert box with mmcore status of the page
2) Extension icon becomes red with SPA text on it when it detects page changes without refresh (history push and pop states)
